description_for_model: API to check the trust score and reputation of any Ethereum or Base network wallet address. Returns a score from 0 to 100, letter grades (AAA-C), and a breakdown of 5 critical on-chain factors (Age, Volume, Success Rate, Diversity, Consistency). Useful for agents to assess counterparty risk before transacting.
description_for_human: Verify wallet reputation and trust scores for agents on Base network.
